title: Stolen Vehicle Tracking Request
description: A customer reports their vehicle has been stolen and needs assistance locating it.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's identity with enhanced security protocols.
Obtain the police report number from the customer, as this is required before tracking can begin.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects and validates the police report number.

tasks.description: Activate the vehicle's GPS tracker and provide the location data directly to the law enforcement agency handling the case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent activates tracking and securely transmits the location to the police.
